terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Carrying something weighing 10-20 lbs (about 4.5-9kg, like a large bag of groceries) from one room to another.
terms.preferredTerm: FACIT-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I: Carry 10-20 Lbs

terms.definition: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Dyspnea 10 Item Short Form - Part I. Over the past 7 days, how short of breath did you get with each of these activities?: Carrying something weighing 10-20 lbs (about 4.5-9kg, like a large bag of groceries) from one room to another. Please indicate why you did not do this in the past 7 days.
